ygData.messageBody:
>From: Greg Gillan <GGillan@...>
>
>Where does charred plate come from? I keep hearing about it, but never see
>any info on where it is located or how hard it is to get?

S
P
O
I
L
E
R

S
P
A
C
E


I t comes from Sol a off a rare clockwork spawn that also drops the charred
shield the druids are nuts about, I think it was an exg model...looked like
a giant doll. Also available are charred gloves n boots in the same dungeon
off the captain kobold spawn near the fireplace room (boots common drop
gloves rare). Be aware you will get BAD faction hits with gnomes if you go
for the BP. Also need to melee the clockwork. I was lucky..we weren't
camping it on purpose..not for a BP..we were after a shield for a druid. Not
sure if theres more pieces out there..if i get any will post.
